channel.title: Run&Compile Help Please
channel.description:
Ok, im sorry to say this, but, im not on the comp that has the server stuff on it so i cant try any of these suggestions atm.
My problem is, everything i try to run or compile it says the same thing:
Could not find the path specified. Could not find the path specified. Press any key to continue . . .
I had ppl tell me to change the code inside to both jdk, both to jre, i have update 7 of java or wtv, and i put 07 in and it said that there was 1 error, that it couldnt read the *.java in it or somthing, and when i put 08 in it says the could not find path specified...
Im using p16 v6, ive got my no-ip thing, i run the no-ip thing, and nothing happens...it says the same thing. PLEASE !!! I NEED HELP !!!
ty...

item.title: Run&Compile Help Please
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Go on compile, right click on it, edit , delete it all and add this

@echo off
title Killscape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
JAVA -Xmx512m server
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause;

Read full topic
